text: Pen God ne anɨb ak nep chɨnop gek gos sek yonok. Ned abe nɨbi Taytus nop dɨtep gem ne gos sek mɨdɨl nɨm, awl apɨl, nop tɨtay gɨpek ak chɨnop agñak. Nɨbi nop anɨgɨl gɨpek, anɨb ak abe God chɨnop gek gos sek yonok. Nɨbi gos awl yɨbɨl yɨp nɨgun agɨl nepek ak, gos nab nɨbi pi ak yɨp yɨmug awl nepek ak, nɨbi yad ayɨp jɨmñɨl yonɨgun agɨl gos nepek ak, takaw anɨb okok mɨdupsek Taytus ne chɨnop agñak. Anɨb ak tek yɨp tep gek mɨñmɨñ yɨbɨl gɨnek.
